text: This week the #NHS in England stood up a fully validated COVID-19 antibody testing service. Covering the whole country. #Pathology networks and @WeBMScientists @WeHCScientists working together. An impressive and outstanding undertaking #teamwork! @IBMScience @RCPath @didoharding
